Basketball Reference players bios

Source: R/bref_bio.R
get_bref_players_bios.Rd

Includes player bios, salaries, contracts and transactions

get_bref_players_bios(players = NULL, player_ids = NULL,
  assign_to_environment = TRUE, return_message = T)

Arguments

players

vector of player names
player_ids

vector of basketball reference player ids
assign_to_environment

if TRUE assigns each table to environment
return_message

if TRUE returns

Value

a data_frame

See also

Other BREF: get_bref_awards, get_bref_coach_dictionary, get_bref_player_dictionary, get_bref_players_seasons, get_bref_seasons_award_votes, get_bref_team_dictionary, get_bref_teams_seasons

Other player: get_players_awards, get_players_career_stats, get_players_tables_data, get_years_draft_combines

Other salaries: get_all_nba_teams_salaries, get_hoops_hype_teams_salary_summary, get_nba_team_salaries, get_teams_hoopshype_salaries

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_bref_players_bios( players = c("Jarrett Allen", "Mitch Richmond", "Michael Adams"),
player_ids = NULL,
assign_to_environment = TRUE)
# }
